content.original: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.prevOriginal: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.content: 燃料电池发动机主要用于轨道系统、个人运输和工业机甲等民间应用.燃料电池发动机产生电力,然后由载具用于操作其推进系统.燃料电池发动机与普通的内燃机相比具有几个优点.虽然它们都需要氧化剂才能运行,但它们可以随时使用储存的氧化剂及燃料,这使其成为潜艇、卫星和海军应用的良好选择.由于大多数燃料电池依靠氢气和氧气运行,它们除了水蒸气之外没有废气,因此燃料电池也被用作建筑物和其他大型结构的发电机.无法使用额外冷却套件、换热器或蓄热器.
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤

content.original: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.prevOriginal: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.content: 与现代内燃机的作用和意义相同,BattleTech中的内燃机主要用于常规车辆和工业领域.他的输出功率远小于同重量的聚变发动机,这意味着要输出与聚变发动机相同的功率,内燃机会更重.

content.original: ICE has reduced speed but grants reduced Heat Generated
content.prevOriginal: ICE has reduced speed but grants reduced Heat Generated
content.content: 内燃机降低速度但是也减少了产热

content.original: Compared to their Star League and Succession War-era counterparts, Primitive Engines are larger and less efficient; typically, modern engines are 80% the size of these early engines for the same amount of power.
content.prevOriginal: Compared to their Star League and Succession War-era counterparts, Primitive Engines are larger and less efficient; typically, modern engines are 80% the size of these early engines for the same amount of power.
content.content: 与它们在星联和继承战争时期的同类相比,原始引擎更大且效率更低. 通常相同功率现代引擎的尺寸是这些早期引擎的80%.

content.original: Need something loud and nasty but cant afford Defiance Boomboxes? We at QuicSell got just the right thing, our Tech's worked hard to bring you this Top of the Line AutoCannon/10. SUPER LOW SAVINGS TO KEEP YOU LAND FREE!
content.prevOriginal: Need something loud and nasty but cant afford Defiance Boomboxes? We at QuicSell got just the right thing, our Tech's worked hard to bring you this Top of the Line AutoCannon/10. SUPER LOW SAVINGS TO KEEP YOU LAND FREE!
content.content: 需要一些吵闹和令人不快的东西,但买不起反抗军噪音盒(Boomboxes)? 在Quicsell公司可以得到了你们想要的东西,我们的技术努力为您带来了这款顶级自动加农炮AC10.超低的价格几乎让你免费安装!

content.content: 这枚火箭发射器被一枚高爆战斗部所取代,在撞击时造成大面积伤害.1发! 不稳定!

content.original: Heavy Rocket Launcher operate on the same Principle as the normal widespread Rocket Launcher, being unguided bolted on One Shot Throwaway Launchers do they carrier a heavier payload..1 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.original: Large Lasers exhibit a powerful combination of damage, range, and compactness but generate a substantial amount of heat. Like all Lasers, Large Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.  The Tronel is an older model, and as such generates 15% more heat than a standard Large Laser would.
content.prevOriginal: Large Lasers exhibit a powerful combination of damage, range, and compactness but generate a substantial amount of heat. Like all Lasers, Large Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.  The Tronel is an older model, and as such generates 15% more heat than a standard Large Laser would.
content.content: 大型激光器具有强大的破坏力、射程和紧凑性,但会产生大量热量.与所有激光一样,大型激光器比其他武器的基础精度更具优势.特罗内尔(Tronel)是一种较旧的型号,因此比标准大型激光产生的热量高15%.

content.original: This 'PAAARTYCANNON' is barely more then 4 Chemical Lasers jury rigged together with a Randomized Focusing Lense to make it change Colours During firing... Someone scratched 'Sta-sta-Staaying Aliive' on it... Uses Chem Medium Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: This 'PAAARTYCANNON' is barely more then 4 Chemical Lasers jury rigged together with a Randomized Focusing Lense to make it change Colours During firing... Someone scratched 'Sta-sta-Staaying Aliive' on it... Uses Chem Medium Ammo.
content.content: 这个"派队(PAAARTY)加农炮"有不超过四个化学激光器,手工将其与随机聚焦透镜装配在一起,使其在发射过程中改变颜色....有人在上面刻了"Sta-sta一直活着" 使用化学中型弹药.

content.original: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Large Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Large Ammo.
content.content: 化学激光并不完全是一项新发明,而是对超光速飞行之前的地球激光武器的重新开发,这种武器依靠化学过程产生完成发射所需的能量. 使用大型化学激光弹药.

content.original: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Medium Ammo.

content.content: 化学激光并不完全是一项新发明,而是对超光速飞行之前的地球激光武器的重新开发,这种武器依靠化学过程产生完成发射所需的能量. 使用小型化学激光弹药.

content.original: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Developed by the Marian Hegemony, they often replace more sophisticated equipment that the Periphery nation cannot afford or is unable to repair.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Developed by the Marian Hegemony, they often replace more sophisticated equipment that the Periphery nation cannot afford or is unable to repair.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.prevOriginal: Tandem Charge Rocket Launcher are a Periphery Favourite to gamble on taking a target out fast, allowing the Rocket to pierce the target and explode internally.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.prevOriginal: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.content: 霹雳火导弹是为索拉里斯竟技场开发的.与大多数导弹系统不同,霹雳火是一种能够粉碎目标的单发导弹系统. 虽然它在竟技场上很有效,但在战场上并没有得到广泛应用,因为这种单发导弹很容易受到反导系统限制. 导弹发射器虽然很小,但安装起来很难,只能安装机甲在左右侧躯干.

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.prevOriginal: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.content: 霹雳火导弹是为索拉里斯竟技场开发的.与大多数导弹系统不同,霹雳火是一种能够粉碎目标的单发导弹系统. 虽然它在竟技场上很有效,但在战场上并没有得到广泛应用,因为这种单发导弹很容易受到反导系统限制. 导弹发射器虽然很小,但安装起来很难,只能安装机甲在左右侧躯干.

content.original: Based on an ancient Ballistic Multiple Launch Rocket System does this fire Long Range Area of Effect Missiles.6 SALVOS! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Based on an ancient Ballistic Multiple Launch Rocket System does this fire Long Range Area of Effect Missiles.6 SALVOS! VOLATILE!
content.content: 基于一个古老的多管弹道火箭系统(MARS),它发射远程的AOE导弹6齐射! 不稳定!

content.original: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield. Unlike standard Medium Lasers, the Argra 27C suffered from a glitch when syncing with targeting computers causing it to be less accurate.
content.prevOriginal: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield. Unlike standard Medium Lasers, the Argra 27C suffered from a glitch when syncing with targeting computers causing it to be less accurate.
content.content: 中型激光的重量轻,且据有相当大的伤害. 因此,在战场上的大多数单位上都至少装备一台. 不像标准中型激光,阿格拉27c与目标计算机同步说出现故障,导致其精度较低.

content.original: Based on a combination of FASCAM Technology and Throw Away Rocket Launchers does this Mine Dispenser allow to deploy a single minefield during Battle.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Based on a combination of FASCAM Technology and Throw Away Rocket Launchers does this Mine Dispenser allow to deploy a single minefield during Battle.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.original: An early prototype of the Particle Projector Cannon (PPC). Its performance is very similar to the later mass produced versions, but it suffers from considerably worse heat build-up.
content.prevOriginal: An early prototype of the Particle Projector Cannon (PPC). Its performance is very similar to the later mass produced versions, but it suffers from considerably worse heat build-up.
content.content: 粒子投射加农炮(PPC)的早期原型.性能与后面大规模生产的版本非常相似,但是会造成热堆积.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: The Heavy Rifle is the largest Rifle in the family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle is based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Heavy Rifle Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Heavy Rifle is the largest Rifle in the family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle is based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Heavy Rifle Ammo.
content.content: 重型线膛炮是线膛炮家族中最大的线膛炮. 作为现代自动炮的前身,该线膛炮基于太空时代前地面上坦克使用的主炮. 使用重型线膛炮弹药.

content.original: The Light Rifle is the smallest of the ''Rifle'' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle is based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Light Rifle Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Light Rifle is the smallest of the ''Rifle'' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle is based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Light Rifle Ammo.
content.content: 轻型线膛炮是''线膛炮家族''中最小的一种. 作为现代自动炮的前身,该线膛炮基于太空时代前地面上坦克使用的主炮. 使用轻型线膛炮弹药

content.original: The Medium Rifle is the middleweight of the 'Rifle' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle was based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Medium Rifle Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Medium Rifle is the middleweight of the 'Rifle' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle was based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra. Uses Medium Rifle Ammo.
content.content: 中型线膛炮是''线膛炮''家族中的中量级线膛炮. 作为现代自动炮的前身,该线膛炮基于太空时代前地面上坦克使用的主炮. 使用中型线膛炮弹药.

content.original: This 'Rifle' is little more than a crude tube with a firing mechanism added to it. Whatever works out there, I guess. Uses Potato Rifle Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: This 'Rifle' is little more than a crude tube with a firing mechanism added to it. Whatever works out there, I guess. Uses Potato Rifle Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 这把线膛炮只不过是在一根粗管上,上面加了一个击发装置. 我猜,不管有什么效果. 使用土豆线膛炮弹药 不稳定!

content.original: Get a taste of true rotary firepower without the burdensome weight and bulk of traditional Rotary Autocannons. Try Quicsell's line of slim and sleek Rotary Rifles. Perfect for your budget firepower needs. Uses Heavy Rifle Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Get a taste of true rotary firepower without the burdensome weight and bulk of traditional Rotary Autocannons. Try Quicsell's line of slim and sleek Rotary Rifles. Perfect for your budget firepower needs. Uses Heavy Rifle Ammo.
content.content: 体验真正的转轮式火力,无需传统旋转式自动炮的沉重重量和体积.试一试Quicesll公司纤薄光滑的转轮式线膛炮. 非常适合您预算的火力需求. 使用重线膛炮弹药.

content.original: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. The Packs have five rockets stacked superposed per tube, each firing cycle launches the front-most rocket. 5 SALVOS! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. The Packs have five rockets stacked superposed per tube, each firing cycle launches the front-most rocket. 5 SALVOS! VOLATILE!
content.content: 火箭弹发射器是廉价的无制导一次性导弹发射器.每个发射器上装有五枚火箭弹,每个发射周期只能发射最前面的火箭弹.5发装! 不稳定!
